#
# V2ME Cleanup 1.0.3b by Bob Bobington and Dr, configured for GFM
#
# Features:
#
#	-Nearly invisible cleanup tag
#	-Zero performance degradation
#	-Immersion will not be ruined, player interaction with cleanup is kept to an absolute minimum
#	-Multiple stability improvements and bug fixes
#	-Easy to customize for new content
#	-Handles backend tasks (i.e. setting govflags, invention flags, etc) on a daily, monthly, or yearly tick, as needed
#	-Handles vassal interactions with one decision instead of hundreds
#
# Notable bugs addressed:
#
#	-Ghost units and ships of non-existing nations cleaned monthly
#	-Prevent uncivs from gaining colonial states/capitals incorrectly
#	-Prevent countries with slavery outlawed from having bugged slave states
#	-Prevents existing countries from having non-existing overlords
#	-Prevents existing countries from having non-existing vassals (disabled by default, this is intended in some mods)
#
# Upcoming features (TBA):
#	-Permanent fix to craftsmen exploit/bug, without player interaction
#	-Dynamically adressing the liquidity crisis, effectively
#
# Most Recent Version Change:
#	-1.0.3b: GFM Version Only, Added Indochina Organization
#


country_event = {
	id = 477877787
	title = "AI: DC"
	desc = "EVTDESC477877787"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Checking..."
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					BOR = { exists = yes }
					NOT = { BOR = { has_country_flag = monarchy_government } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				BOR = { all_core = { add_core = FRA remove_core = BOR } change_tag = FRA }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					SPC = { exists = yes }
					NOT = { SPC = { has_country_flag = monarchy_government } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				SPC = {
					remove_country_modifier = fueros_unresolved_1
					remove_country_modifier = fueros_unresolved_2
					remove_country_modifier = fueros_unresolved_3
					remove_country_modifier = fueros_unresolved_4
					remove_country_modifier = fueros_unresolved_5
					remove_country_modifier = fueros_unresolved_6
					remove_country_modifier = fueros_unresolved_7
					remove_country_modifier = carlist_distributism
					remove_country_modifier = marotist_reforms
					any_owned = {
						remove_province_modifier = fueros_autonomy
						remove_province_modifier = fueros_autonomy_2
						remove_province_modifier = fueros_autonomy_3
						remove_province_modifier = fueros_autonomy_4
					}
					all_core = {
						add_core = SPA
						remove_core = SPC
					}
					change_tag = SPA
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					SOV = {
						exists = yes
						NOT = {
							government = proletarian_dictatorship
							exists = RUS
						}
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				SOV = { change_tag = RUS }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					SWI = {
						ai = no
						has_country_modifier = neutrality_modifier
						OR = {
							any_greater_power = { military_access = SWI }
							any_neighbor_country = { NOT = { vassal_of = SWI } military_access = SWI }
							sphere_owner = { military_access = SWI }
							AND = {
								num_of_allies = 1
								NOT = { NCT = { alliance_with = SWI } }
							}
							AND = {
								num_of_allies = 2
								NCT = { exists = yes alliance_with = SWI }
							}
							war = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				any_country = {
					limit = {
						exists = yes
						NOT = { vassal_of = SWI }
						OR = {
							military_access = SWI
							alliance_with = SWI
						}
					}
					relation = { who = SWI value = -125 }
				}
				any_country = {
					limit = {
						exists = yes
						alliance_with = SWI
						NOT = { vassal_of = SWI }
					}
					leave_alliance = SWI
				}
				any_country = {
					limit = {
						exists = yes
						war_with = SWI
					}
					end_war = SWI
				}
				any_country = {
					limit = {
						exists = yes
						military_access = SWI
						NOT = { vassal_of = SWI }
					}
					end_military_access = SWI
				}
			}
		}
		#updating missing flags
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = existing_country
				}
				exists = yes
			}
			set_country_flag = existing_country
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = existing_country
				exists = no
			}
			clr_country_flag = existing_country
		}

		#removing the lost war flag
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = lost_the_war
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war }
			}
			clr_country_flag = lost_the_war
		}

		#pay owed steamers
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 5 }
				ammunition = 5
			}
			ammunition = -5
			change_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = -5 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 5 }
				small_arms = 5
			}
			small_arms = -5
			change_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = -5 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 5 }
				artillery = 5
			}
			artillery = -5
			change_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = -5 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 5 }
				canned_food = 5
			}
			canned_food = -5
			change_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = -5 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 }
				money = 10000
			}
			money = -10000
			change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = -10 }
		}

		#release colonies that weren't annexed (soon to be deprecated, remove later)
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_vassal = yes
				has_country_flag = colony_to_be_annexed_flag
				war = no
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = colony_to_be_annexed }
			}
			clr_country_flag = colony_to_be_annexed_flag
			country_event = 477877788
			neutrality = yes
		}

		#new round of dismantlement (soon to be deprecated, remove later)
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_vassal = yes
				has_country_modifier = colony_to_be_annexed
				war = no
				OR = {
					any_greater_power = { has_country_modifier = dismantling_country }
					any_neighbor_country = { has_country_modifier = dismantling_country }
				}
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = considering_colonial_offer }
				ai = yes
			}
			random_list = {
                17 = { overlord = { country_event = 70005 } }
                17 = { overlord = { country_event = { id = 70005 days = 1 } } }
                17 = { overlord = { country_event = { id = 70005 days = 2 } } }
                17 = { overlord = { country_event = { id = 70005 days = 3 } } }
                17 = { overlord = { country_event = { id = 70005 days = 4 } } }
                15 = { overlord = { country_event = { id = 70005 days = 5 } } }
            }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					ENG = {
						has_country_modifier = pax_britannica
						rank = 1
					}
					OR = {
						AND = {
							any_greater_power = { alliance_with = ENG }
							ENG = { NOT = { has_country_flag = ai_splendid_isolation } }
						}
						AND = {
							any_greater_power = { AND = { ai = yes alliance_with = ENG } }
							ENG = { has_country_flag = ai_splendid_isolation }
						}
					}
					OR = {
						TUR = {
							is_greater_power = yes
							NOT = { alliance_with = ENG }
						}
						TUR = { is_greater_power = no }
						AND = {
							ENG = { has_country_flag = ai_splendid_isolation }
							TUR = { ai = no }
						}
					}
					OR = {
						JAP = {
							is_greater_power = yes
							NOT = { alliance_with = ENG }
						}
						JAP = { is_greater_power = no }
						AND = {
							ENG = { has_country_flag = ai_splendid_isolation }
							JAP = { ai = no }
						}
					}
					OR = {
						BEL = {
							is_greater_power = yes
							NOT = { alliance_with = ENG }
						}
						BEL = { is_greater_power = no }
						AND = {
							ENG = { has_country_flag = ai_splendid_isolation }
							BEL = { ai = no }
						}
					}
					OR = {
						POR = {
							is_greater_power = yes
							NOT = { alliance_with = ENG }
						}
						POR = { is_greater_power = no }
						AND = {
							ENG = { has_country_flag = ai_splendid_isolation }
							POR = { ai = no }
						}
					}
					NOT = { exists = IRE }
					NOT = { exists = GER }
					NOT = { exists = GCF }
					NOT = { year = 1870 }
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							EGY = { war_with = TUR }
							war_with = EGY
							OR = {
								war_with = FRA
								war_with = BOR
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				random_owned = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							ENG = { NOT = { has_country_flag = ai_splendid_isolation } }
						}
					}
					owner = {
						any_greater_power = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									tag = BEL
									tag = JAP
									tag = TUR
								}
								alliance_with = ENG
							}
							leave_alliance = ENG
							relation = { who = ENG value = -150 }
						}
					}
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							ENG = { has_country_flag = ai_splendid_isolation }
						}
					}
					owner = {
						any_greater_power = {
							limit = {
								ai = yes
								NOT = {
									tag = BEL
									tag = JAP
									tag = TUR
								}
								alliance_with = ENG
							}
							leave_alliance = ENG
							relation = { who = ENG value = -150 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		CLN = { country_event = { id = 477877787 days = 1 } }
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 84393532
	title = "AI: 2MC"
	desc = "EVTDESC84393532"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Checking..."
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						FGC = {
							has_country_modifier = panamanian_integration
						}
						GCO = {
							has_country_modifier = panamanian_integration
						}
						CLM = {
							has_country_modifier = panamanian_integration
						}
					}
					OR = {
						PNM = { exists = yes }
						2204 = {
							NOT = { owned_by = FGC owned_by = GCO owned_by = CLM }
						}
					}
					2204 = { is_core = PNM }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				FGC = {
					clr_country_flag = panamanian_integration
					remove_country_modifier = panamanian_integration
				}
				GCO = {
					clr_country_flag = panamanian_integration
					remove_country_modifier = panamanian_integration
				}
				CLM = {
					clr_country_flag = panamanian_integration
					remove_country_modifier = panamanian_integration
				}
			}
		}
		#native assimilation cleanup
		any_country = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = native_assimilation_enacted
                NOT = { has_country_modifier = native_assimilation_act_policy }
            }
            clr_country_flag = native_assimilation_enacted
        }
		any_country = {
            limit = {
                is_vassal = yes
				is_mobilised = no
                overlord = { is_mobilised = yes }
				total_pops = 2500
				war = yes
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Itriedmobilizing }
            }
            any_owned = { limit = { NOT = { province_control_days = 1 } } change_controller = UTI }
			set_country_flag = Itriedmobilizing
        }
		any_country = {
            limit = {
				war = no
				has_country_flag = Itriedmobilizing
            }
			clr_country_flag = Itriedmobilizing
        }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { province_id = 3486 }
			}
			secede_province = ---
		}
		#abolishing serfdom
		any_country = {
            limit = {
                any_owned_province = { has_pop_type = serfs }
                NOT = { debt_law = serfdom }
            }
            any_owned = {
                limit = {
                    has_pop_type = serfs
                    has_pop_type = labourers
                }
                any_pop = { limit = { type = serfs } pop_type = labourers money = 1000 }
            }
            any_owned = {
                limit = {
                    has_pop_type = serfs
                    has_pop_type = farmers
                }
                any_pop = { limit = { type = serfs } pop_type = farmers money = 1000 }
            }
            any_owned = {
                limit = {
                    has_pop_type = serfs
                    NOT = { has_pop_type = farmers has_pop_type = labourers }
                }
                any_pop = { limit = { type = serfs } pop_type = farmers money = 1000 }
            }
        }
		any_land_province = {
			limit = {
				is_core = CSA
				is_core = MEX
				owned_by = MEX
				CSA = { NOT = { has_country_flag = 36_or_fight } }
			}
			remove_core = CSA
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				ai = yes
				has_country_flag = can_use_monthly
			}
			clr_country_flag = can_use_monthly
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = panamanian_integration
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = panamanian_integration }
				PNM = { exists = no }
				owns = 2204
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { is_core = PNM }
					has_pop_culture = central_american
					militancy = 4
				}
				move_pop = 2201
			}
			PNM = { all_core = { add_core = THIS remove_core = PNM } }
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 3564
						province_id = 128
						province_id = 3447
						province_id = 2205
					}
				}
				remove_core = COS
				remove_core = UCA
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = { tag = AST owns = 2476 NOT = { capital = 2476 } }
					AND = { tag = HON owns = 3363 NOT = { capital = 3363 } }
					AND = { tag = GLM owns = 702 NOT = { capital = 702 } }
					AND = { tag = NET owns = 375 NOT = { capital = 375 } }
					AND = { tag = POL owns = 706 NOT = { capital = 706 } }
					AND = { tag = BUL owns = 809 NOT = { capital = 809 capital = 860 } }
					AND = { tag = HUN owns = 641 NOT = { capital = 641 } }
					AND = { tag = NYE owns = 1178 NOT = { capital = 1178 } }
					AND = { tag = YEM owns = 1178 NOT = { capital = 1178 } }
					AND = { tag = LIT owns = 360 NOT = { capital = 360 } }
					AND = { tag = EGY owns = 1745 NOT = { capital = 1745 } }
					AND = { tag = NIC owns = 2197 NOT = { capital = 2197 } }
					AND = { tag = GHN owns = 1907 NOT = { capital = 1907 } }
					AND = { tag = ALD owns = 1700 NOT = { capital = 1700 } }
					AND = { tag = NIG owns = 1808 NOT = { capital = 1808 } }
					AND = { tag = MLI owns = 1794 NOT = { capital = 1794 } }
					AND = { tag = TNZ owns = 3875 NOT = { capital = 3875 } }
					AND = { tag = HND owns = 1236 NOT = { capital = 1236 } }
					AND = { tag = MUG owns = 1236 NOT = { capital = 1236 } }
					AND = { tag = LUA owns = 1357 NOT = { capital = 1357 } }
					AND = { tag = CNG owns = 1983 NOT = { capital = 1983 } NOT = { has_global_flag = congo_renamed } }
					AND = { tag = CNG owns = 1985 NOT = { capital = 1985 } has_global_flag = congo_renamed }
					AND = { tag = KAM owns = 1082 NOT = { capital = 1082 } }
					AND = { tag = UKR owns = 958 NOT = { capital = 958 } }
					AND = { tag = CUB owns = 2209 NOT = { capital = 2209 } }
					AND = { tag = GRE owns = 860 NOT = { capital = 860 } state_n_government = 1 prestige = 40 860 = { is_core = GRE } }
					AND = { tag = PHL owns = 1455 NOT = { capital = 1455 } }
					AND = { tag = SIA owns = 1346 NOT = { capital = 1346 } }
					AND = { tag = CAM owns = 1364 NOT = { capital = 1364 } }
					AND = { tag = BUR owns = 1334 NOT = { capital = 1334 } }
					AND = { tag = MLY owns = 1387 NOT = { capital = 1387 } }
					AND = { tag = TKM owns = 1387 NOT = { capital = 1204 } }
					AND = { tag = KHI owns = 1195 NOT = { capital = 1195 } NOT = { government = absolute_empire government = constitutional_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } }
					AND = { tag = DRV owns = 1207 NOT = { capital = 1207 capital = 1199 capital = 1198 capital = 1195 capital = 1202 } }
					AND = { tag = KYR owns = 1189 NOT = { capital = 1189 } }
					AND = { tag = TUR has_country_flag = monarchy_government owns = 863 NOT = { capital = 863 capital = 860 } }
					AND = { tag = TUR NOT = { has_country_flag = monarchy_government } owns = 876 NOT = { capital = 876 capital = 860 } }
					AND = { tag = INO owns = 1413 NOT = { capital = 1413 } }
					AND = { tag = ARG owns = 2348 NOT = { capital = 2348 capital = 2360 } }
					AND = { tag = CRO owns = 771 NOT = { capital = 771 } }
					AND = { tag = AUS owns = 619 NOT = { capital = 619 } }
					AND = { tag = IRE owns = 263 NOT = { capital = 263 } }
					AND = { tag = KAZ owns = 1197 NOT = { capital = 1197 } }
					AND = { tag = VEN owns = 729 NOT = { capital = 729 } }
					AND = { tag = KOR owns = 1624 NOT = { capital = 1624 } }
					AND = { tag = ALB owns = 849 NOT = { capital = 849 government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire government = constitutional_empire } }
					AND = { tag = SLO owns = 768 NOT = { capital = 768 } }
					AND = { tag = ASH civilized = yes owns = 1907 NOT = { capital = 1907 } }
					AND = { tag = SUD owns = 1827 NOT = { capital = 1827 } }
					AND = { tag = PRU owns = 549 NOT = { capital = 549 } }
					AND = { tag = SWE owns = 322 NOT = { capital = 322 } }
					AND = { tag = OMA has_global_flag = zanzibaromancapital owns = 2048 NOT = { capital = 2048 } }
					AND = { tag = MZR owns = 2048 NOT = { capital = 2048 } }
					AND = { tag = OMA has_global_flag = zanzibaromancapital owns = 1166 NOT = { owns = 2048 } NOT = { capital = 1166 } }
					AND = { tag = OMA NOT = { has_global_flag = zanzibaromancapital } owns = 1166 NOT = { capital = 1166 } }
					AND = { tag = ARM owns = 887 NOT = { capital = 887 owns = 1098 } }
					AND = { tag = ARM owns = 1098 NOT = { capital = 1098 } }
					AND = { tag = GEO owns = 1090 NOT = { capital = 1090 } }
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = you_can_change_capital
		}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
						tag = TUR
						owns = 849
						owns = 851
						owns = 850
						owns = 3308
						owns = 3307
						owns = 853
						owns = 852
						owns = 858
						owns = 1780
						owns = 806
						owns = 3291
						owns = 3421
						owns = 803
						owns = 802
						owns = 3420
						owns = 2577
						owns = 804
						is_greater_power = no
						NOT = {
							exists = ALB
						}
						NOT = {
							has_country_flag = released_albania
						}
						war = no
						NOT = { owns = 824 }
						NOT = { owns = 3306 }
						NOT = { owns = 819 }
						NOT = { owns = 3342 }
						NOT = { owns = 807 }
						NOT = { owns = 799 }
						NOT = { owns = 3346 }
						NOT = { owns = 807 }
						NOT = { owns = 796 }
						NOT = { owns = 797 }
						NOT = { owns = 787 }
						NOT = { owns = 2569 }
						NOT = { owns = 2583 }
						NOT = { owns = 800 }
					}
					set_country_flag = released_albania
					prestige = -5
					any_owned = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_core = ALB
								province_id = 2577
								province_id = 804
								province_id = 3291
								province_id = 806
							}
						}
						secede_province = THIS
						secede_province = ALB
					}
					create_vassal = ALB
					create_alliance = ALB
					relation = { who = ALB value = 200 }
					ALB = { government = absolute_monarchy }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = TUR
					war = no
					is_vassal = no
					owns = 849
					NOT = {
						exists = ALB
					}
					NOT = {
						owns = 3308
						owns = 850
						owns = 851
						owns = 852
					}
					ai = yes
				}
				849 = { secede_province = THIS }
				849 = { secede_province = ALB }
				create_vassal = ALB
				create_alliance = ALB
				ALB = { government = absolute_monarchy }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = TUR
					war = no
					is_vassal = no
					owns = 849
					owns = 851
					NOT = {
						exists = ALB
					}
					NOT = {
						owns = 3308
						owns = 850
						owns = 852
					}
					ai = yes
				}
				849 = { secede_province = THIS }
				849 = { secede_province = ALB }
				851 = { secede_province = THIS }
				851 = { secede_province = ALB }
				create_vassal = ALB
				create_alliance = ALB
				ALB = { government = absolute_monarchy }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = TUR
					war = no
					is_vassal = no
					owns = 849
					owns = 851
					owns = 852
					NOT = {

			diplomatic_influence = { who = COM value = -3.2 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				ai = yes
				diplomatic_influence = { who = COM value = 2 }
				NOT = { diplomatic_influence = { who = COM value = 4 } }
			}
			diplomatic_influence = { who = COM value = -1.4 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				ai = no
				diplomatic_influence = { who = COM value = 2 }
			}
			diplomatic_influence = { who = COM value = -1 }
		}
		
		##### South America colonial cleanup #####
		### Brazil ###
		## Bolivia ##
		any_country = { limit = { tag = BOL NOT = { government = colonial_company } OR = { AND = { exists = no all_core = { OR = { owned_by = BRZ is_empty = yes } } } vassal_of = BRZ } } government = colonial_company }
		## Entre Rios ##
		any_country = { limit = { tag = ENT NOT = { government = colonial_company } OR = { AND = { exists = no all_core = { OR = { owned_by = BRZ is_empty = yes } } } vassal_of = BRZ } } government = colonial_company }
		## Uruguay ##
		any_country = { limit = { tag = URU NOT = { government = colonial_company_2 } OR = { AND = { exists = no all_core = { OR = { owned_by = BRZ is_empty = yes } } } vassal_of = BRZ } } government = colonial_company_2 }
		### Argentina ###
		## Bolivia ##
		any_country = { limit = { tag = BOL NOT = { government = colonial_company_2 } OR = { AND = { exists = no all_core = { OR = { owned_by = ARC owned_by = ARG owned_by = LPL is_empty = yes } } } OR = { vassal_of = ARC vassal_of = ARG vassal_of = LPL } } } government = colonial_company_2 }
		### Gran COlombia ###
		## Bolivia ##
		any_country = { limit = { tag = BOL NOT = { government = colonial_company_3 } OR = { AND = { exists = no all_core = { OR = { owned_by = GCO owned_by = FGC is_empty = yes } } } OR = { vassal_of = GCO vassal_of = FGC } } } government = colonial_company_3 }
		## United Central America ##
		any_country = { limit = { tag = UCA NOT = { government = colonial_company_3 } OR = { AND = { exists = no all_core = { OR = { owned_by = GCO owned_by = FGC is_empty = yes } } } OR = { vassal_of = GCO vassal_of = FGC } } } government = colonial_company_3 }
		## Chile ##
		any_country = { limit = { tag = CHL NOT = { government = colonial_company_3 } OR = { AND = { exists = no all_core = { OR = { owned_by = GCO owned_by = FGC is_empty = yes } } } OR = { vassal_of = GCO vassal_of = FGC } } } government = colonial_company_3 }
		## Peru ##
		any_country = { limit = { tag = PEU NOT = { government = colonial_company_3 } OR = { AND = { exists = no all_core = { OR = { owned_by = GCO owned_by = FGC is_empty = yes } } } OR = { vassal_of = GCO vassal_of = FGC } } } government = colonial_company_3 }
		## Acre ##
		any_country = { limit = { tag = ACE NOT = { government = colonial_company_3 } OR = { AND = { exists = no all_core = { OR = { owned_by = GCO owned_by = FGC is_empty = yes } } } OR = { vassal_of = GCO vassal_of = FGC } } } government = colonial_company_3 }
		### Peru-Bolivia ###
		## Chile ##
		any_country = { limit = { tag = CHL NOT = { government = colonial_company } OR = { AND = { exists = no all_core = { OR  = { owned_by = PBC is_empty = yes } } } vassal_of = PBC } } government = colonial_company }
	}
}

						AND = {
							OR = {
								any_greater_power = { invention = submarines high_sea_battle_fleet = 1 }
								any_neighbor_country = { invention = submarines high_sea_battle_fleet = 1 }
								sphere_owner = { invention = submarines high_sea_battle_fleet = 1 }
								overlord = { invention = submarines high_sea_battle_fleet = 1 }
							}
							NOT = { steam_turbine_ships = 1 }
						}
						#Dreadnoughts
						AND = {
							OR = {
								any_greater_power = { invention = dreadnoughts high_sea_battle_fleet = 1 }
								any_neighbor_country = { invention = dreadnoughts high_sea_battle_fleet = 1 }
								sphere_owner = { invention = dreadnoughts high_sea_battle_fleet = 1 }
								overlord = { invention = dreadnoughts high_sea_battle_fleet = 1 }
							}
							NOT = { steam_turbine_ships = 1 }
						}
					}
			}
			set_country_flag = insane_warship_check
		}

					is_sphere_leader_of = CAM
					ai = yes
				}
				OR = {
					FRA = { exists = yes ai = yes }
					BOR = { exists = yes ai = yes }
				}
				exists = yes
				ai = yes
			}
			USA = { diplomatic_influence = { who = CAM value = -400 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = LUA
				civilized = no
				USA = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = LUA
					ai = yes
				}
				OR = {
					FRA = { exists = yes ai = yes }
					BOR = { exists = yes ai = yes }
				}
				exists = yes
				ai = yes
			}
			USA = { diplomatic_influence = { who = LUA value = -400 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = ETH
				neighbour = EGY
				EGY = {
					ai = yes
					exists = yes
					NOT = {
						any_owned_province = { is_core = ETH }
						casus_belli = ETH
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = mission_to_cairo
					any_owned_province = { is_core = EGY }
					any_owned_province = { is_core = SUD }
					casus_belli = EGY
					truce_with = EGY
				}
				NOT = { war_with = EGY }
				ai = yes
			}
			ETH = {
				set_country_flag = mission_to_cairo
				relation = { who = EGY value = 200 }
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = MOZ
				owns = 2053
				OR = {
					government = absolute_monarchy
					government = hms_government
					government = prussian_constitutionalism
				}
				vassal_of = POR
				NOT = {
					2063 = { owned_by = POR }
					3678 = { owned_by = POR }
					3970 = { owned_by = POR }
					2581 = { owned_by = POR }
					3791 = { owned_by = POR }
					2065 = { owned_by = POR }
					2064 = { owned_by = POR }
					2060 = { owned_by = POR }
					2061 = { owned_by = POR }
					2059 = { owned_by = POR }
					3803 = { owned_by = POR }
					2057 = { owned_by = POR }
					2058 = { owned_by = POR }
					2052 = { owned_by = POR }
					3677 = { owned_by = POR }
					3884 = { owned_by = POR }
					2051 = { owned_by = POR }
					3650 = { owned_by = POR }
					2050 = { owned_by = POR }
					2049 = { owned_by = POR }
					3919 = { owned_by = POR }
				}
			}
			POR = {
				release_vassal = MOZ
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				NCT = { exists = yes government = prov_gov_conservative }
				SWI = { has_country_flag = sonderbund war = no }
				has_global_flag = sonderbund_war
			} }
			owner = {
			NCT = { country_event = 18482414 }
		} }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NCT = { exists = no government = prov_gov_conservative } SWI = { has_country_flag = sonderbund war = no } CLN = { has_country_flag = global_mc_setup_complete } } } owner = { CLN = { country_event = 78568543 } } }
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				NCT = { exists = no government = prov_gov_conservative } SWI = { has_country_flag = sonderbund war = no }
			} }
			owner = {
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				608 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = NCT }
				PRU = {
					diplomatic_influence = {
						who = NCT
						value = 400
					}
				}
				SWI = { create_vassal = NCT }
				NCT = {
					government = absolute_monarchy
					primary_culture = north_german
					remove_accepted_culture = south_german
					remove_accepted_culture = french
					remove_accepted_culture = north_italian
					remove_accepted_culture = romansh
				}
		} }
		#Section 0: Colonial vassals are made westernized if after 1860, tested
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					year = 1860
				}
			}
			owner = {
				any_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = british_accepted
							has_country_flag = french_accepted
							has_country_flag = german_accepted
							has_country_flag = spanish_accepted
							has_country_flag = danish_accepted
							has_country_flag = swedish_accepted
							has_country_flag = portuguese_accepted
							has_country_flag = italian_accepted
							has_country_flag = japanese_accepted
							has_country_flag = dutch_accepted
							has_country_flag = russian_accepted
							has_country_flag = belgian_accepted
						}
						NOT = { tag = KAS tag = BNG tag = SRI tag = ASM } #You go the normal route
						civilized = no
						exists = yes
					}
					civilized = yes
					country_event = 39573
				}
			}
		}
		#Section 1: Countries with colonial accepted cultures that are no longer colonies or switch overlords lose their former colonial accepted cultures, tested
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = british_accepted
				accepted_culture = british
				OR = {
					is_vassal = no
					AND = { is_vassal = yes NOT = { overlord = { primary_culture = british } } }
				}
			}
			remove_accepted_culture = british
			clr_country_flag = british_accepted
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						tag = SYR
					}
				}
				owner = {
					remove_accepted_culture = syriac
					remove_accepted_culture = assyrian
				}
			}
		}

					accepted_culture = north_german

					is_vassal = no

                has_province_modifier = indian_lands
            }
            remove_province_modifier = indian_lands
        }
		any_land_province = {
			limit = { province_id = 3251 AND = { trade_goods = precious_goods NOT = { has_province_modifier = casino } } }
			3251 = { add_province_modifier = { name = casino duration = -1 } }
        }
		CLN = { country_event = { id = 477877790 days = 30 } }
		country_event = { id = 84393532 days = 1 }
	}
}

		any_country = {

				OR = {
					owns = 1955
					owns = 1973
					owns = 3936
				}
				civilized = yes
				war = no
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						owns = 1973
						OR = { machine_guns = 1 has_global_flag = berlin_conference year = 1895 }
						NOT = {
							has_country_flag = guine_quatorial_master
							has_global_flag = guine_quatorial_organized
							capital_scope = { continent = africa }
							capital_scope = { continent = west_africa }
							capital_scope = { continent = central_africa }
							capital_scope = { continent = east_africa }
							capital_scope = { continent = south_africa }
						}
						EQG = { exists = no }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_global_flag = guine_quatorial_organized
					set_country_flag = guine_quatorial_master
					EQG = { all_core = { remove_core = EQG } }
					1955 = { add_core = EQG remove_core = TRZ }

		#substate payment
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					is_substate = yes
					AND = {
						is_vassal = yes
						is_substate = no
						total_pops = 250000
					}
				}
				NOT = { has_country_flag = exempt_from_vassal_contribution }
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = monthly_payment_made }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						money = 1500
						NOT = { total_pops = 750000 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					treasury = -1500
					overlord = { treasury = 1500 }
					add_country_modifier = { name = monthly_payment_made duration = 365 }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						money = 2500

				}

			}

		#upgrade rebels
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					year = 1880
					NOT = { has_global_flag = rebel_tech_1850 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				REB = {
					activate_technology = post_napoleonic_thought
					activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
					activate_technology = muzzle_loaded_rifles
					activate_technology = bronze_muzzle_loaded_artillery
					activate_technology = military_staff_system
					activate_technology = army_command_principle
				}
				set_global_flag = rebel_tech_1850
				2518 = { add_core = PHL remove_core = YEM }
				2525 = { add_core = VTU remove_core = YEM }
				2579 = { add_core = VTU remove_core = YEM }
				2522 = { add_core = VTU remove_core = YEM }
				610 = { add_core = VTU remove_core = YEM }
				2527 = { add_core = VTU remove_core = YEM }
				2551 = { add_core = TMT remove_core = YEM }
				2541 = { add_core = TMT remove_core = YEM }
				2526 = { add_core = TMT remove_core = YEM }

				2545 = { add_core = TMT remove_core = YEM }

				3905 = { add_core = TMT remove_core = YEM }
				2552 = { add_core = TMT remove_core = YEM }
				2553 = { add_core = TMT remove_core = YEM }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					year = 1900
					NOT = { has_global_flag = rebel_tech_1870 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_global_flag = rebel_tech_1870
				REB = {
					activate_technology = strategic_mobility
					activate_technology = breech_loaded_rifles
					activate_technology = iron_muzzle_loaded_artillery

country_event = {
	id = 477877788
	title = "Freedom"
	desc = "EVTDESC477877788"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Nice."
		overlord = { release_vassal = THIS }
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 477877789
	title = "AI: Cleanup Setup"
	desc = "EVTDESC477877789"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Cleanup Setup"
		CLN = {
			country_event = 477877787
			country_event = 477877790
			country_event = 477877791
			add_country_modifier = { name = neutrality_modifier duration = -1 }
		}
	}
}

##vassal interactions events

country_event = {
	id = 477877792
	title = "Vassal Interactions: $FROMCOUNTRY$"
	desc = "EVTDESC477877792"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Release this country"
		FROM = {
			country_event = 477877788
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			clr_country_flag = interacted_with
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "Return cores to this country"
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = FROM
				NOT = { is_core = THIS }
			}
			secede_province = FROM
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			clr_country_flag = interacted_with
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "Next country"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				vassal_of = THIS
				exists = yes
				NOT = { has_country_flag = interacted_with }
			}
			country_event = 477877793
			THIS = { set_country_flag = possible_interactions }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				vassal_of = THIS
				exists = yes
				THIS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = possible_interactions } }
			}
			clr_country_flag = interacted_with
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "Exit options"
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			clr_country_flag = interacted_with
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 477877793
	title = "AI: Vassal Interactions"
	desc = "EVTDESC477877793"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "OK"
		set_country_flag = interacted_with
		FROM = { clr_country_flag = possible_interactions }
		overlord = { country_event = 477877792 }
	}
}
